description: Publicly readable bucket found during scan
recommendation: Set bucket policy to private; enable bucket encryption; enable access logging

description: Overly permissive admin-like policy attached to dev role
business_impact: Potential for privilege escalation and data exfiltration
recommendation: Apply least privilege; create scoped roles; implement permission boundaries

description: CloudTrail not configured in all regions
business_impact: Gaps in audit logging may hinder incident response
recommendation: Enable CloudTrail in all regions and centralize to logging account
